content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr. Sheila Ilangovan received her BSc (Comp), MSc (Math) and PhD (Math) degrees from Faculty of Computer Science and Information System, and Faculty of Science, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) in 2002, 2004 and 2013, respectively. She is now an Assistant Professor in Foundation of Science, Faculty of Science, University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus. Dr. Sheila is mainly working in the area of conjugacy classes and graphs related for finite groups. Main teaching activity focus on Mathematics for Science I, II and III for science students. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
